audio-settings.reference_record_text_example: The water cycle is a circulation system of nature, where water evaporates from the ground, forms clouds, and then returns to the ground in the form of rain. This circulation process is crucial for life on earth.

audio-settings.speaker: Select timbre
audio-settings.too_long: The recording duration exceeds 90 seconds, please re-record.
audio-settings.too_short: The recording duration is less than 10 seconds, please re-record.
audio-settings.upload_audio_tip: Upload voice file (minimum 10 seconds, maximum 90 seconds, recommended 25 seconds)
